text: Polyalthia glabra is a species of plant in the family Annonaceae. It is a tree endemic to Peninsular Malaysia. It is threatened by habitat loss.Kochummen, K.M. 1998. Polyalthia glabra. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
